title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: CoinAgenda Global | October 21-23, 2022 | Las Vegas Event Website: https://coinagenda.com/CoinAgenda connects investors, traders, family offices and digital currency funds with top entrepreneurs in blockchain and cryptocurrency.This year, weâ€™ve seen the cryptocurrency market hit $2.5 trillion, leading payment providers recognize and settle in crypto, large institutional investors launch services and increase their digital asset portfolios, the first Bitcoin ETF in North America, DeFi increase trading volume and new users to all-time-highs, bank-breaking star-studded NFTs, and a renewed focus on crypto regulation from global policymakers. CoinAgenda has been there for it all gathering the bright minds behind these milestones. Now looking forward to hosting in-person events again safely and to continue driving blockchain forward.

comments.author: S3cco
comments.body: CoinAgenda Announces First Round of Speakers for Ninth Annual Las Vegas and Sixth Annual Puerto Rico Web3, Blockchain and Crypto Conferences https://bitcoingarden.org/coinagenda-announces-first-round-of-speakers-for-ninth-annual-las-vegas-and-sixth-annual-puerto-rico-web3...CoinAgenda gathers founders from great companies, investors and ideas in Las Vegas right before Money2020, and then six weeks later in Puerto Rico during Puerto Rico Blockchain Week with top-tier speakers on stage.CoinAgenda, the premier global conference series connecting blockchain and cryptocurrency investors with startups since 2014, and BitAngels, the leading network of bitcoin and blockchain investors, today announced the ninth annual CoinAgenda Global conference will be held at Circa Resort in Las Vegas on October 21-23 and the sixth annual CoinAgenda Caribbean will be hosted December 5-7 during Puerto Rico Blockchain Week in one of the cryptocurrency hubs of the world, Puerto Rico. CoinAgenda Caribbean will be hosted at the Fairmont hotel with special locations for parties and dinners.Tickets are available on the event page. Tickets provide a VIP experience for all attendees, with access to sessions, networking, and exclusive parties. CoinAgenda will accept crypto payments, in addition to offering discounted tickets for locals....
